title: Thunderstruck
description: Jordan, Rowen and the crews of both the Tempest and the Artemesia strike out for Philadelphia to start a revolution aimed at abolishing slavery and changing their stormpowered society to one that runs on previously repressed steam innovations and will allow for true equality. But can Jordan and Rowen come back together after all the things determined to drive them apart?Thunderstruck is the third installment in the Weather Witch series from Shannon Delany.
author: Shannon Delany
